titles.title: As Pants The Hart For Cooling Streams (familia

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}As pants the hart for cooling streams When heated in the chase So longs my soul O God for thee And Thy refreshing grace{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Why restless why cast down my soul Trust God who will employ His aid for thee And change these sighs To thankful hymns of joy{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}For thee my God the living God My thirsty soul doth pine O when shall I behold thy face Thou majesty divine{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}God of my Strength how long shall I Like one forgotten mourn Forlorn forsaken and exposed To my oppressor's scorn{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Why restless why cast down my soul Hope still and thou shalt sing The praise of him who is thy God Thy health's eternal spring{/lang-eng}
